name: Bridge Builder Racer
detailed_description:
Bridge Builder Racer is the ultimate test for both your engineering and driving skills. Create your bridge without any limitations other than your creativity. After building you can race over your own bridge to get from point A to B as fast, and cheap as possible! Each level has a total of 3 stars to be earned. The less money you spent, the higher the star rating. Can you beat all levels with a 3 star rating?

Build your bridge
The first stage of each level is to build your bridge.


Race your bridge
After building the bridge, you'll manually control the car to go over your newly created bridge.


Challange your friends
With the implementation of Steam Leadersboards, you can challange your friends and see who's the best at both building, and driving!


Key Features
* Over 45 challenging levels
* Beautiful low-poly landscapes
* Realistic car physics (kinda)
* Intutive controls
* Steam leaderboards
